content.p: Accessible language learning for everyone We offer a broad range of high quality language learning for students, staff and the general public. Our aim is to help you ‘Talk to The World’, so come along and find your voice! Learn a language as part of your degree Language learning for all View all events @languagecentreuon Instagram @LangCentreUoN X (twitter) @languagecentreuniversityof4792 Youtube Email us: languagecentre@nottingham.ac.uk
